title: Karl Marx
ability: When drawn, show and choose theory or critique. You gain +1 theory (critique) for each card with theory (critique) drawn.

title: Rosa Luxemburg
ability: When played, you may appropriate 1 card from the deck or 2 numeraire from opponent.

title: Paul Sweezy
ability: When played, you may discard two cards to double theory/critique.

title: Adam Smith
ability: At end of game, other classical theorists have +1 influence

title: David Ricardo
ability: At end of game, gain +1 influence for each 2 concepts in deck.

title: Thomas Malthus
ability: At end of game, before scoring, opponent must discard one theorist if able.

title: Leon Walras
ability: When played, draw 3.

title: Alfred Marshall
ability: When played, you may switch theory/critique values of played cards.

title: Vilfredo Pareto
ability: When played, offer opponent a choice (1) you draw 6-N; they draw N or (2) you draw 1; they draw 0.

title: Thorstein Veblen
ability: Gain 2 numeraire. Opponent shows hand. Veblen may emulate any card shown.

title: Joan Robinson
ability: When played, opponent must discard 1 or pay 4 Numeraire.

title: James Crotty
ability: When played, you may flip and shuffle card pool. Unflip at start of your next turn.

title: Water-Diamond Paradox
ability: When won, next card you acquire costs 1 less.

title: General Gluts
ability: Next turn, your opponent can not acquire concepts

title: Cambridge Capital Controvery
ability: You may trash card in card pool or hand.

title: Value Theory
ability: Gain +6 Numeraire

title: Socialist Calculation
ability: Redistribute Numeraire until equal.

title: Production and Distribution
ability: Each player acquires a card of their choice, starting with opponent.

title: Das Kapital 1 (1867)
ability: Concepts have Synthesis: +1/+1

title: Die Akkumulation des Kapitals (1913)
ability: You may trash a demand/supply for a reference/argument

title: Theorien über den Mehrwert (1863)
ability: If you've played another Marxist card this turn, non-Marxist cards cost 1 less theory

title: The Wealth of Nations
ability: Controversies won while this card is in play earn +1 influence

title: Principles of Political Economy and Taxation
ability: Concepts acquired while this card is in play earn +1 influence

title: An Essay on the Principle of Population
ability: If able, opponent must lose +2 numeraire when acquiring theorist.

title: Éléments d'économie politique pure (1874)
ability: Once per turn, trade text from discard pile for any non-controversy  in card pool.

title: Grundsätze der Volkswirtschaftslehre (1871)
ability: Gain 1 Numeraire at start of turn.

title: The Theory of the Leisure Class
ability: May emulate another text in play. Reverts when that text leaves.

title: If Women Counted
ability: Once per turn, search discard/deck for woman; add to your hand.

title: labor power
ability: Gain +1 numeraire per Theorist in card pool and in play.

title: primitive accumulation
ability: When played, you may pay lose two influence to win controversy of up to 5 value.

title: falling rate of profit
ability: Lose 6 numeraire now or Devalue (1) card pool at end of your turn.

title: stationary state
ability: When played, gain +1 numeraire per text you have in play.

title: unproductive labor
ability: Only concepts can be played on the turn you play Unproductive Labor.

title: accumulation
ability: Gain +1 Numeraire per 3 Numeraire.

title: division of labor
ability: Gain +1 Stats per Theorist played this turn.

title: marginal utility
ability: When played, draw a card. The next card you play this turn gets -1 Theory

title: marginal product
ability: When played, draw a card. The next card you play this turn gets -1 Critique

title: indifference curve
ability: When played, draw a card. The next card's T/C stats can be redistributed.

title: rational agent
ability: Draw two cards, play 1 and discard 1

title: conspicuous consumption
ability: When played, this turn you may acquire opponent's in play text for V+2 each.

title: dependence effect
ability: Gain +2 numeraire. Play this card on non-controversy in card pool. The next time your opponent acquires from card pool it must be this card. Trash dependence effect.

title: fundamental uncertainty
ability: Opponent chooses whether this is a 4,0 or 0,4

title: care work
ability: Opponent loses 2 numeraire if able.
